head.title: No Jobs Found

input.name: __EVENTVALIDATION

div.style: animation: a0_t 0.8s linear infinite, a0_h 0.8s linear infinite;
animation: a1_t 0.8s linear infinite, a1_w 0.8s linear infinite, a1_h 0.8s linear infinite;
animation: a3_t 0.8s linear infinite, a3_w 0.8s linear infinite, a3_h 0.8s linear infinite;

div.class: hidden-xs hidden-sm collapse navbar-collapse navbar-main hide-custom-width

div.div: we can still help, don't give up.

div.p: we weren't able to find any jobs in Elkin, Kansas. let's try a different search to find you that perfect job.

div.h2: alert me when a job does match.

select.name: frequency
select.ng-options: obj.value as obj.label for obj in myOptions

a.title: sign up
a.class: default rounded corners rd-button rd-button-search rd-button-search-blue href

div.div: job title is a required field
please fill out a valid location
zip code is a required field
zip code should be in valid format
email should be in valid format

div.span: read these articles to help you in your search to find your dream job.

div.p: Drop in and say "hi" at one of our branch locations.

input.placeholder: enter a city, state or zip code
input.name: SearchLocationTextBox

span.class: font-size-16 padding-left-10 toggle-icon icon icon-chevron-down pull-right
font-size-16 padding-left-10 toggle-icon icon icon-chevron-down pull-right

li.a: how to write a cover letter

span.class: font-size-16 padding-left-10 toggle-icon icon icon-chevron-down pull-right
font-size-16 padding-left-10 toggle-icon icon icon-chevron-down pull-right
